about.title: Dunia Safari Tours
about.description1: From stadium roars to desert stars, we specialize in curated experiences that celebrate both Africa's greatest sporting events and Morocco's timeless beauty.
about.description2: We deliver the beating heart of our DESTINATION, authentic moments, immersive culture, and memories that no generic package can match.
about.trustedDescription: Verified partners, licensed guides, WhatsApp check-ins, clear meeting points, and practical tips to eliminate the small frictions that make or break a trip.
about.budgetDescription: We design custom itineraries that feel premium without the premium price tag. You see the total cost upfront, no fluff!
about.curatedDescription: 3 Adventures (e.g. desert safari, waterfalls, Atlas mountains). 3 Quiet moments (e.g. Berber village visit, sunset walks, hammam).

carousel.slide1Subtitle: Travel, celebrate, and create memories that last a lifetime.
carousel.slide2Subtitle: From Sahara dunes to Atlas peaks, adventure meets culture.
carousel.slide3Subtitle: Souks, lanterns, and flavors you'll never forget.
carousel.slide4Subtitle: Hike the Atlas Mountains and explore Morocco's beauty.
carousel.joinWhatsApp: Join our WhatsApp community for updates

groupPerks.title: Group Travel Perks
groupPerks.subtitle: Why traveling with Dunia Safari groups enhances your experience
groupPerks.sharedDescription: Group travel makes every moment richer — from cheering together in AFCON stadiums to bonds formed during desert sunsets and urban adventures.
groupPerks.discountsDescription: Enjoy reduced rates on flights, hotels, and experiences when you travel as a group.
groupPerks.hassleFreeDescription: We handle the logistics (flights, transfers, tours, tickets), so your group can simply relax and enjoy

testimonials.title: Traveler Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our travelers say about their travel experiences with Mimi Babs

testimonial1.name: [Rudy from Belgium]
testimonial1.text: Traveling with Mimi Babs was like being pampered. From Marrakech to Ourika and Essaouira, she handled every detail. Transportation, activities, and those hidden gems you'd never find on your own. All I had to do was enjoy the ride. I'm so proud of what she's building with Dunia Safari and excited to see more people experience travel this way.

testimonial2.name: [Sarah from Canada]
testimonial2.text: I had the pleasure of meeting Mimi through a mutual Couchsurfing friend while traveling in Sierra Leone, and she quickly became an indispensable part of my journey. Mimi is a true sweetheart, laid-back, adventurous, intelligent, and adaptable to any situation. Our conversations flowed effortlessly, and she has a remarkable ability to make those around her feel at ease. We got along so well that we decided to continue our travels together in Guinea. I couldn't have asked for a better travel companion; our time together was absolutely fantastic. I wholeheartedly recommend Mimi to anyone considering hosting or traveling with her.

testimonial3.name: [Adolfo from Ecuador]
testimonial3.text: Mimi and I met in Morocco and spent a few glorious days together hiking and exploring ancient kasbahs. We reconnected later in Essaouira, where we shared a wonderful afternoon enjoying fresh seafood by the sea. She radiates pure good vibes, the kind of travel companion who makes every experience memorable

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AFCON 2025 travel packages
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help!
faq.question0: What matches do the AFCON packages cover?
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.question4: What's the difference between Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages?
faq.question5: Do you only operate in Morocco?
faq.question6: What is Dunia Safari's refund policy?
faq.answer0: Our packages include 2 matches in Fez, Rabat, and Marrakech for Nigerian, Tanzanian, and Ivorian fans respectively, blending football, culture, and exploration. Want 3 matches plus New Year's in Morocco? Contact our travel agent for the extended itinerary.
faq.answer1:
Book early — Christmas/New Year has high demand and higher rates.

Steps:

  1. 1. Select your package on the website.
  2. 2. A travel agent will contact you via WhatsApp within 24 hours for flights, insurance, and visa support.
  3. 3. Pay before the deadline to receive flight, hotel, and stadium ticket confirmations.
  4. 4. Be added to our WhatsApp broadcast group for updates.
faq.answer2:
Q: — For Ghanaian passport holders.

A: — No visa required. You must complete Morocco's Electronic Travel Authorization (Morocco Access) online before travel (typically processed in ~24 hours).

Q: — For Ivorian and Nigerian passport holders.

A: — Yes, visa required. If you hold a valid Schengen/US/UK/Canada visa or residence permit, you can typically apply for a Morocco eVisa online.

Otherwise, apply at the Moroccan consulate in Abidjan and Abuja

Typical visa processing is about 10 business days, but you need to secure your visa appointment at least 3 weeks in advance
faq.answer3:
A: — We accept debit/credit cards (Visa/Mastercard), bank transfers, and mobile money (Ghana only). If your preferred method isn't listed, contact our travel agent for alternatives.

Q: — How are exchange rates handled?

A: — For cross-currency payments, we use the prevailing market rate at the time of billing/ordering. Your bank or provider may apply a small FX margin.

Q: — Will I receive a receipt?

A: — Yes. Receipts are issued within 24 hours of each payment.
faq.answer4: The Bronze Package offers room sharing in a riad or hostel and the essential AFCON travel experience. Silver and Gold Packages upgrade you to private rooms in 2-star and 3-star hotels, respectively, and include additional experiences like hammam spa and visa application support. For full details, please refer to the individual package descriptions.
faq.answer5: Our launch focus is Morocco. Especially travel aligned with AFCON 2025 and holiday packages, but our long-term vision includes Egypt, Cape Verde, Turkey, and other exciting destinations across the world
faq.answer6: Deposits are generally non-refundable, as they secure your flight, hotel, and match tickets. Depending on the situation, Dunia Safari may reschedule your booking to a later date or allow you to transfer your package to another traveler if you cannot travel yourself. Terms and conditions apply.

biography.paragraph1: Mimi Babs is a passionate solo traveler who has explored over 20 countries worldwide, from Dubai to the United States to South Korea. With over a decade of experience in sales, marketing, and business development, she has consistently acted as an intrapreneur, raising hundreds of thousands to millions of dollars in funding for the organizations she has worked with.
biography.paragraph2: Traveling is more than a passion for Mimi, it's a way of life. She has traveled to almost every West African country, mostly by road and always on a budget. A lover of nature and outdoor adventure. She often says her only regret is not starting her adventures in her early twenties.

mission.title: Travel Africa, Transform Africa
mission.description: In September 2025, Mimi launched Dunia Safari to make travel accessible and inspire African youth to explore their own continent. She believes that progress to unite Africa starts with seeing and experiencing the continent firsthand.
mission.collaboration: Mimi welcomes collaborations, partnerships, and sponsorships to help make this dream a reality in her lifetime.
